text: Ezɨ dughiar kamɨn ikegha ghua, Iesus uan suren gumaziba bighavɨra me mɨgɨa ghaze, a Jerusalemɨn mangam, eghtɨ gumazir aruaba, ko ofa gamir gumazir ekiaba, ko Judan Arazibagh fozir gumaziba, a men dafarimɨn bar mɨzazir ekiaba ko osɨmtɨziba iniam. Eghtɨ me an aghuaghɨva a mɨsueghtɨma an aremegham. Egh dughiar mɨkezimɨn a ua dɨkavigham.
